title: Regulates the provision of appliance warranties especially with respect to charges for repair outside the home
summary: Regulates the provision of appliance warranties and requires disclosure of transportation charges for the repair of warranted appliances outside the home.

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  GABRYSZAK, MILLMAN, SPANO, CASTRO, HOOPER --
         Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of A. BOYLAND, CAHILL, COOK,  DUPREY,  GOTT-
         FRIED,  HIKIND, KOLB, MAYERSOHN, McENENY, PHEFFER, SWEENEY, WEISENBERG
         -- read once and referred to the Committee  on  Consumer  Affairs  and
         Protection

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  general  business law, in relation to appliance
         warranties

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The general business law is amended by adding a new section
    2  395-c to read as follows:
    3    S 395-C. APPLIANCE WARRANTIES. 1. FOR PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION:
    4    (A)  "PERSON"  MEANS  AN INDIVIDUAL, FIRM, PARTNERSHIP, TRUST, ASSOCI-
    5  ATION OR CORPORATION.
    6    (B) "SERVICE DEALER" MEANS A PERSON WHO FOR COMPENSATION,  ENGAGES  IN
    7  THE BUSINESS OF REPAIRING OR SERVICING APPLIANCES PURSUANT TO A WARRANTY
    8  OR GUARANTEE GIVEN TO A PURCHASER.
    9    (C)  "APPLIANCE"  MEANS  ANY  ELECTRONIC  DEVICE  OR EQUIPMENT THAT IS
   10  COMMONLY USED OR  SOLD  FOR  PERSONAL,  FAMILY  OR  HOUSEHOLD  PURPOSES,
   11  INCLUDING,  BUT  NOT  LIMITED  TO,  TELEVISIONS, RADIOS, STEREO SYSTEMS,
   12  COMPACT DISC  PLAYERS,  HOME  COMPUTER  SYSTEMS,  TELEPHONES,  TELEPHONE
   13  ANSWERING   MACHINES,  SATELLITE  DISHES,  CAMERAS,  CALCULATORS,  VIDEO
   14  RECORDERS OR PLAYERS,  CAMCORDERS  OR  OTHER  PORTABLE  VIDEO  RECORDING
   15  DEVICES,  CASSETTE  RECORDERS  OR  PLAYERS, FACSIMILE MACHINES, PORTABLE
   16  PHOTOCOPIERS,  AIR  CONDITIONERS,  CLOTHES  WASHING  MACHINES,   CLOTHES
   17  DRYERS,  DISHWASHERS,  FOOD  FREEZERS,  REFRIGERATORS,  STOVES,  RANGES,
   18  OVENS, MICROWAVE OVENS OR SEWING MACHINES.
   19    2. EVERY SERVICE DEALER SHALL FOR EVERY WARRANTY OF SERVICE OR  REPAIR
   20  MADE  TO  AN  APPLIANCE  IN  COMPLIANCE  WITH  A  WARRANTY OR GUARANTEE,
   21  DISCLOSE IN WRITING WHETHER ANY CHARGE  WILL  BE  IMPOSED  FOR  SERVICES

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07629-01-1

       A. 2641                             2

    1  RENDERED  IN  CONNECTION WITH TRANSPORTING SUCH APPLIANCE TO AND/OR FROM
    2  THE LOCATION WHERE THE APPLIANCE IS LOCATED.
    3    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
    4  have become a law.
